import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { CommonModule } from '@angular/common'; @Component({ selector: 'app-article', standalone: true, imports: [CommonModule], templateUrl: './article.component.html', styleUrl: './article.component.scss' }) export class ArticleComponent { }
